Summary: Seen in sky with strange movements and interacted with airliner flying beside it then zooming straight upsnd blinking out!
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was setting at my table underneath my back patio as my wife was BBQing, I noticed a yellowish light (like a sodium vapor light) in the diastance. Given the angle from my perspective I would imagin it to be around 15 miles out. It seem to me at first to be a helicopter. As it got closer it made am abrupt turn north then totally reverse direction and proceeded south for maby 3 seconds and stopes and hovered in place and glowed incredibly bright. At this point it was mabey 5 miles out. I called over my wife and she seen it also. Something else I want to point out is we live under the approach to LAX for planes coming in from the north, it's like a highway in the sky. I would guess there altitude to be 5500'. We had a near full moon at the time and the object was at the 7:00 position to the moon. It stayed stationary for 5 minutes then moved into the path of incoming planes, as one plane approached I noticed the object moved to avoid it at the same time it's light intensity decreased then it started to move into the glow of the moon then it blinked a few times then disappeared straight up. I kept an eye out for it but it was gone. As all this was happening I had an uneasy feeling about it and I also felt it was observing the air planes flying into LAX. I've observed alot aircraft but nothing has these traits that I witnessed that night, it seemed like it was intelligently operated although somewhat indecisive in what direction to fly in. Also I felt like it knew I was observing it and as it flew off it did so by bleeding in with the moon glow.
